Info.Description:
Body Armour Durability Enhancement Modifies the properties of the purchaseable body armour
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] Body Armour is not depleted by wild animal attacks. [*] As a trade-off, body armour does not protect the player from wild animal attacks. [*] The same properties apply to the melee attacks of the Royal Army Beheader. [/list]
Version: 1.0 - FINAL
[size=1][color=lightgreen]Author: [/color][b]LinkHero95[/b][/size] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Credit to: [/color][b]JRavens[/b][/size]
